name: Fruit Pop Fiesta
description:
Match 3 or more items in any direction. Develop your brain's pattern matching skills. Practice pattern matching to improve Cognitive skills.

Kids Safe - No Ads, No Popups, No In-App Purchase, No Social Media

- Match 3 puzzle
- 100+ Levels
- Multiple Game modes
- Create Matches in any Direction

Created by Parents to enable a safe learning environment for our kids. We welcome your feedback and suggestions to improve our games and apps at MakerFiesta.com
